title: Performance Indicator
description: Schema for a measurable KPI or performance metric used across the Orthogramic Metamodel.

indicatorID.description: Unique identifier for the performance indicator

title.description: Short name or label for the indicator

description.description: Detailed description of what the indicator measures

baselineValue.description: The value before intervention or change

currentValue.description: Most recent known or calculated value

targetValue.description: Value to be achieved for success

targetDate.description: Date by which the target value should be achieved

assessmentFrequency.description: How often the performance indicator is evaluated (e.g., monthly, quarterly)

dataSource.description: Where the measurement data originates from

owner.description: Owner or accountable person/team for the indicator

orgUnitTitle.description: Name of the organisational unit responsible
